DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Telbivudine Prevent Perinatal Transmission
DOC.detailed_description: In present study , evaluate effect telbivudine give second third trimester pregnancy highly viremic , HBV DNA-positive mother maternal HBV DNA HBeAg level prior delivery rate vertical transmission HBV infant receive passive-active immunoprophylaxis . Additionally , investigate time administration telbivudine reduce risk perinatal transmission safety telbivudine pregnancy .
